channel.title: Infrastructure and Management on SAP on Microsoft - Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Infrastructure and Management on SAP on Microsoft - Tutorials

item.title: Monitoring SAP
item.description: Azure Monitoring for SAP One of the benefits of monitoring SAP on Azure is the integrated view of both Infrastructure metrics (like CPU, RAM and Disk) alongside HANA database metrics (like memory usage and memory growth), and Netweaver metrics like concurrent sessions and locks. This allows for a rapid response in case of an incident response as well as provinding a simpler and more integrated way of having the whole SAP performance picture in a glance.

item.title: Azure Backup for HANA
